DOC.brief_summary: This randomized placebo-controlled double-blind , multi-centre trial determine efficacy probiotic VSL # 3 prevention Crohn 's disease development follow surgical resection re-anastomosis . A total 120 patient randomly assign 1:1 ratio receive VSL # 3 placebo 90 day . Patients respond study treatment , define absence severe endoscopic recurrence day 90 , offer open-label VSL # 3 additional 9 month .
